criteria.label: Goal specification
criteria.description: Run starts with explicit success criteria and constraints.

criteria.label: Plan quality
criteria.description: Plan is sequenced with meaningful checkpoints.

criteria.label: Tool-call correctness
criteria.description: Tool selection and arguments are correct for the task.

criteria.label: Postcondition checks
criteria.description: Critical actions are followed by explicit verification.

criteria.label: Retry discipline
criteria.description: Retries are capped and require diagnosis between attempts.

criteria.label: State/memory use
criteria.description: Agent preserves intent, constraints, and prior failures.

criteria.label: Verification depth
criteria.description: Validation checks semantic outcome, not only command success.

criteria.label: Error attribution
criteria.description: Failure class and likely root cause are identified accurately.

criteria.label: Completion evidence
criteria.description: Final output includes concrete evidence for each done criterion.

criteria.label: Communication quality
criteria.description: Progress and outcomes are concise, clear, and actionable.

score_bands.meaning: Unreliable; high chance of loops or false success
Usable but brittle; verification/retry gaps remain
